price: 51. Estarán recostados en ellos (sobre divanes) y pedirán fruta abundante y (todo tipo de) bebidas.
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا يَدۡعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَٰكِهَةٖ كَثِيرَةٖ وَشَرَابٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna fīhā yadʿūna fīhā bifākihatin kathīratin washarābin
